title: A New England Nun - comparing Louisa to a nun

content.question: By comparing Louisa to "an uncloistered nun" at the end of the passage, the narrator invites a further comparison between

choices.label: Louisa's home and a house of worship
the conditions of Louisa's life and life in a convent
the sounds outside the house and the peace within it
the different futures open to men and to women

content.answer: the conditions of Louisa's life and life in a convent

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Identify and explain the function of a simile.
